orxVIEWPORT_EVENT {...}{.size: 4.} = enum
  orxVIEWPORT_EVENT_RESIZE = 0, ## Event sent when a viewport has been resized
  orxVIEWPORT_EVENT_NUMBER, orxVIEWPORT_EVENT_NONE = 4294967295
